languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, внимательно изучая фигуры на доске. Вы видите, как расслабляются его скулы, а во взгляде появляется живая искра.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, внимательно изучая фигуры на доске. Вы видите, как расслабляются его скулы, а во взгляде появляется живая искра.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, внимательно изучая фигуры на доске. Вы видите, как расслабляются его скулы, а во взгляде появляется живая искра.{/n}

{n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希陷入了沉默，专注地研究着棋盘上的棋子。你看到他的下巴不再紧绷，双眼中也燃起了带着生机的火花。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希陷入了沉默，专注地研究着棋盘上的棋子。你看到他的下巴不再紧绷，双眼中也燃起了带着生机的火花。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio mientras estudia las piezas del tablero. Ves que su mandíbula se relaja y la chispa de la vida ilumina sus ojos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix guarda silencio mientras estudia las piezas del tablero. Ves que su mandíbula se relaja y la chispa de la vida ilumina sus ojos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、盤面の駒を熱心に研究しながら沈黙した。彼の顎が緩み、目に生命の輝きが宿るのがわかる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、盤面の駒を熱心に研究しながら沈黙した。彼の顎が緩み、目に生命の輝きが宿るのがわかる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix s'enferme dans le silence tout en observant attentivement les pièces sur le plateau avec une étincelle dans le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix s'enferme dans le silence tout en observant attentivement les pièces sur le plateau avec une étincelle dans le regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix verfällt in Schweigen, während er konzentriert die Figuren auf dem Brett studiert. Du bemerkst, wie sich sein Kiefer entspannt und in seinen Augen ein Lebensfunke aufblitzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Oyun tahtasındaki taşları dikkatle inceleyen Heinrix, sessizliğe bürünüyor. Çenesindeki gerginliği attığını ve gözlerinde yaşamın parlak kıvılcımlarını görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix lapses into silence as he intently studies the pieces on the board. You see his jaw relax, and a spark of life kindles in his eyes.{/n}
